Soul Bomb

A Soul Bomb is a type of arcane weapon which harnesses the mana unleashed by Soul Destruction or soul_fission to create an enormous explosion, sometimes affecting a chain reaction. Such weapons can be tuned to specifically destroy the vessels of atman, leaving most other matter intact and minimally contaminated, but they are condemned by the Charon regardless of how targeted or tactically deployed they may be.

The invention and utilisation of Soul Bombs by the Graadien civilisation against that of Darohl, which lead to that war being named the Arcane Holocaust, lead to the purging of Graadien by the Charon.
